trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when trying to access a drive or share that is not available.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試存取不可用之磁碟或共用時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException> class uses the HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException>類別會使用 HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown when a Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT error is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 遇到 Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT 錯誤時，可以擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with its message string set to a system-supplied message and its HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 將其訊息字串設定為系統提供的訊息且將其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified directory."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 找不到指定的目錄。"

trans-unit.source: This message is localized based on the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會根據目前系統文化特性進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified message string and the HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息字串和設為 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND 的 HRESULT，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式使用 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 參數來初始化新執行個體的 `message` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含關於擲回例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含關於擲回例外狀況之來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化 (Serialization) 和內容資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和造成這個例外狀況原因的內部例外狀況參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
